description.message: Install Netflix Party Chrome extension to watch Netflix in sync with your friends

tab_group_restore.message: When a tab group is restored, send the tabs to:

start_onetab_automatically.message: Display OneTab whenever you start your web browser for the first time

dont_add_pinned.message: Don't send pinned tabs to OneTab:

add_pinned.message: Allow pinned tabs to be sent to OneTab:

restore_all_title.message: On clicking 'restore all' or restoring a single tab:

dont_keep_restore_list.message: Open the tabs and remove them from your OneTab list

dont_keep_restore_list_note.message: You still can press ctrl, cmd or shift to restore the tab(s) without removing them from OneTab. If you set any of your tab groups as 'locked' then the tabs will not be removed from OneTab unless you unlock that tab group first.

keep_restore_list.message: Keep them in your OneTab list

keep_restore_list_note.message: You can manually delete entries by hovering over them and clicking the X icon, or by clicking the 'delete all' button

reject_duplicates_note.message: If OneTab already contains the URL of a tab, it will not be added again. This only applies when you click the OneTab icon
